remarks: ` H ` is a function.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
etransclem1.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ CC ) $.
etransclem1.p $e |- ( ph -> P e. NN ) $.
etransclem1.h $e |- H = ( j e. ( 0 ... M ) |-> ( x e. X |-> ( ( x - j ) ^ if ( j = 0 , ( P - 1 ) , P ) ) ) ) $.
etransclem1.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( 0 ... M ) ) $.
etransclem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( H ` J ) : X --> CC ) $.
$d J x $.
$d M j $.
$d P j $.
$d X j x $.
$d ph x $.
